sign_in: Please sign in to submit or moderate points.
choose_menu: Please choose a menu above to get started.
submit_point_clause: Submit an entry about a point in the terms
edit_a_point: Edit a point about a clause
publish_warning: Publishing writes the complete database (excluding non-approved points) to the file system, from where it can be served as static web content.
title: Title
subtitle: Subtitle
name: Name
contribution_published: Your contribution will be published under a
title_placeholder: e.g. “This service tracks you on other websites” or “Broad copyright license on your content”
what_the_clause: What the clause in the terms does or says. Try not to write more than 5 sentences. Be creative. Feel free to include some quotes from the terms’ clause directly. But the most important is that it’s easy to understand and written in plain English.
point_applies: Service(s) to which the point applies
user_not_verified: Check your email! If you did not receive a registration email, then please contact editapp+issues at tosdr.org.
